session_info.name: FROB - Data Acquisition and Processing Platform

papers.title: RFSoCs in Beam Instrumentation Systems
authors: RFSoCs are new devices that integrate digital systems (programmable logic
etc.) with high speed ADCs and DACs

all on a single chip. This talk could include: - Brief introduction to RFSoC technology - Current target applications and development efforts in the beam instrumentation community - Future of RFSoC technology and relevant applications
